issue.title: [C++] Support sorting for decimal data type.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11662](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11662). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems sorting on decimal datum is not implemented yet til 3.0.0.

Is there special reason not support it?

Is the implementation on roadmap?

Any workaround to sort on decimal datum so far?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11662?focusedCommentId=17285858) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Thanks for opening this. No, there is no particular reason for not supporting decimal sorts. It just needs to be implemented.
(I also suspect it wouldn't be very difficult)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11662?focusedCommentId=17291823) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9577
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9577>
